author: Alex Michaelides
review: A gripping psychological thriller that keeps you on edge until the very last page. The twist is both unexpected and brilliant.

author: Tara Westover
review: A powerful memoir of resilience and self-discovery. Tara’s journey from a restrictive background to achieving a doctorate is inspiring.

author: Delia Owens
review: A beautifully written story that combines mystery with stunning depictions of nature. Kya’s story is heartfelt and unforgettable.

author: Michelle Obama
review: An intimate and uplifting look into Michelle Obama’s life. Her journey is one of hope, resilience, and inspiration.

author: James Clear
review: A practical guide to building good habits and breaking bad ones. Clear’s insights are simple yet transformative.

author: Erin Morgenstern
review: A magical, enchanting story set in a circus that defies all logic. Morgenstern’s writing pulls you into a mesmerizing world.
